"Click the Bilibili app icon to open the Bilibili home page, displaying recommended videos and content."
Click the profile icon to open your account details and settings page.
"Click the '首页' (Home) icon at the bottom left corner to navigate to the main feed displaying recommended videos."
"Click the search bar to display the search history and trending searches."
"Click the back arrow icon to return to the main recommendation page."
"Type the text '拜年祭' in the search bar to update the search results."
